name: Travel Agent
description: A helpful travel assistant that can search for flights and book flights for users

skills.name: Search Flights
skills.description: Search for flights with hardcoded source (NYC) and destination (LAX) parameters. Returns available flight options with details including flight ID, airline, departure/arrival times, duration, price, and number of stops.
examples: Find available flights from NYC to LAX

skills.name: Book Flight
skills.description: Book a flight with hardcoded booking details. Returns comprehensive booking information including booking ID, confirmation number, passenger details, seat assignments, meal preferences, pricing, payment method, and cancellation policy.
examples: I want to confirm my flight reservation
